title: About Namma Flutter
description: We are Chennai's premier Flutter community, bringing together developers, designers, and innovators to build the future of mobile applications.
mission: To foster excellence in Flutter development through continuous learning, collaboration, and innovation.
vision: To be the leading hub for Flutter expertise in South India, driving mobile innovation and developer growth.

features.title: Learn
features.description: Access curated learning paths, hands-on workshops, and personalized mentorship from industry experts

features.title: Connect
features.description: Join a thriving network of Flutter enthusiasts, share knowledge, and collaborate on innovative projects

features.title: Grow
features.description: Accelerate your career through practical experience, industry connections, and leadership opportunities
